title: Neo PAX Sivir and Epic Capsules

replies.body: So seeing as I have PAX Sivir on my account right now (have had for quite a few years actually but that's not the point) I get this Neo PAX Sivir free? But it's just going to change colors correct? Not add a crown or anything like Championship Riven did?
Yes, you'll get Neo PAX Sivir automatically. You'll still have the original PAX Sivir, too, which will get an exclusive border.
Kind of skipped over his main question there. Is it going to be essentially identical to the original or is it going to be noticeably different in color, etc.?

OG Pax Sivir has a color scheme of black/dark grey with blue some spots of red here and there.

Neo PAX has a color scheme of Yellow, blue, and a lighter shade of grey. 

I would guess they would look different in game as the differences in their splash arts imply.
yes--also the original PAX Sivir isn't going away or changing. Neo PAX Sivir is getting added.
Will... will... will there be any love for the PAX Jax owners... :C

That's what I want to know too -- I want the skin but I don't really want to spend the money trying to get it since I already have PAX Sivir... It's only fair that Pax Sivir owners get this version too.

The post does say that if you already own PAX Sivir you get Neo Pax Sivir for free and an exclusive Border on PAX Sivir. I was just clarifying that nothing else was changing on the original PAX Sivir.

The new effects are also on the 2016 one, making it so the new effects were essentially a VU for the skin. The "different" model is legit a crown placed on top of her head and it's very easy to miss. Again loading screen borders are easily missed by most players since most alt tab during the loading screen. I do have the original CS Riven, it's the only reason I'm complaining. Side by side, Original CS Riven and 2016 have very few differences. 

If you're talking about new effects for the original, it really is only a VU that would've happened eventually, the way riot has been working. If you just saw OG CS and CS 2016 in game, you'd be hard pressed to actually see the very few differences

Championship Riven got touched up and re-released. Those of us who had the original CS Riven only got a small crown (which I don't like, I much prefer the crownless version), and a border on the loading screen. The two versions in-game are entirely identical excluding that crown, and there's no way to swap between them (probably due to the lack of differences).

When you say that Neo-PAX Sivir will be legacy and will drop skin shards, does this mean permanently, or just during this time frame? For instance, if I'm too poor for this right now and all through X-mas, will I still have a chance to get Neo-PAX Sivir in like February next year through loot chests, albeit rarely?

Well considering they have a Time Frame in the post it's probably safe to say that she's only available for that time. Being Legacy though, means she'll return again in the future.  She probably won't be obtainable though outside of the current time frame, so it is a bit different from other Legacy skins.

That's what I want to know. They said she's craftable in that time frame, after which she goes in the legacy vault. But the current PAX Sivir isn't legacy - it's limited. So that's what I want to know if this will be just as obtainable as like Winter Wonder Karma or some other skin.
Probably not. It's like a Limited Legacy skin, so it'd only be available when they make it available.
